name: InfiniTale
description:
InfiniTale is a Roguelike Turn Based RPG. You play through an endless dungeon, fighting many varied enemies, cast spells, level up and equip gear to make you stronger. InfiniTale is a deep roguelike with many combat choices. Enjoy!

All donations really help me continue to work on this project! Please consider donating at least 1-2$ Thanks!

FEATURES COMING SOON:

-Randomly Generated Dungeon (Lots of floors)

-Massive Amount of Stats, spells and status effects to play around with

-Items and Equipment (Inventory)

-Level Up System

-Log Text for whats happening during combat

HOW TO PLAY:

-You have 4 turn points to use on your turn

-Right Click in a direction to move (costs 1 turn point per move while in combat)

-Press 1 to select the spell and left click to use it on the grid positions it shows (this spell costs 1 turn point per use)

-You will enter combat when you get close to enemies

-Your health is at the top of the screen along with your turn points
